content.prompt: Humanists would most likely criticize behaviorists on the grounds that behaviorism

choices.label: focuses too much on the drive toward self-actualization
is only concerned with elements of personality that develop from repressed trauma
overemphasizes cognitive processes involved in personality development
rejects free will and focuses solely on observable experiences

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
